statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); output_style=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.output_style.name'); git_branch=$(cd "$current_dir" && git symbolic-ref --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo 'no-git'); git_status=$(cd "$current_dir" && git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null | wc -l | tr -d ' '); [ "$git_status" = "0" ] && git_clean="✓" || git_clean="✗"; printf "\033[32m➜\033[0m \033[36m%s\033[0m \033[90m(%s)\033[0m \033[33m%s\033[0m \033[32m%s\033[0m \033[90m[%s]\033[0m" "$(basename "$current_dir")" "$git_branch" "$git_clean" "$model" "$output_style"
